item.description:
Dear Members,
We have agreed on the format of the meetings in order to maximize the benefits for the Presenter and the contributing members.
For those of you who were not able to attend our prior meetings, we have agreed to follow the following format:
1. Review Prior Meeting Discussion and Updates
2. Presentation of Current Business Focus
3. Round Table Discussion of Issues and Concerns
4. Assessment of Recommendations on Focus Topic
5. Preliminary Overview of the Agenda of next Business Focus
Before the scheduled meeting, the Presenter will distribute an introductory paper by email to include a brief summary of the enterprise, desired discussion agenda, and presenter's expectations from the contributing members of the Group.
All materials provided by the presenter as part of the meeting must be kept confidential by participating members and is not for dissemination outside of the group without the express consent of the presenter.
For planning and scheduling purposes, the next three meetings are scheduled as follow:

September 26, 2007, Panera Bread, Framingham, MA 7pm-9pm
October 24, 2007, Panera Bread, Framingham, MA 7pm-9pm
November 28, 2007, Panera Bread, Framingham, MA 7pm-9pm

We look forward to a productive year with everyone. Please kindly send me your email addresses so members can communicate with each other directly. Thank you very much.
Sincerely,
Peter Melencio
Moderator and Organizer
V - 508-620-2800
C - 508-930-4417
item.name: Focus on Tom DeCoste's Goals and Issues
